0.smallLine: Fast. Secure. Reliable. — We move your time-critical shipments across the globe, 24/7.

1.smallLine: Our 24/7 Onboard Courier team ensures the fastest, safest, and most transparent hand-carry delivery from pickup to final handover.

2.smallLine: Your urgent shipment is personally escorted door-to-door, monitored in real time, and delivered exactly when you need it.

AboutSection.label: About Us
AboutSection.title: About OBC Care
AboutSection.subtitle: Your Global Partner in Time-Critical Logistics
AboutSection.p1: At OBC Care, we move what matters most: from production spare parts and AOG shipments to automotive components and electronic equipment.
AboutSection.p2: We're trusted by businesses worldwide to handle high-value, urgent shipments with precision, reliability, and full transparency.

0.title: Multi-Industry Logistics Solutions
0.description: We specialize in mission-critical deliveries for aircraft parts, industrial spares, electronics, fashion items, and sensitive documents worldwide.

1.title: Complete Door-to-Door Service
1.description: From pickup to handover, every stage is managed by our professional team with care and accuracy.

2.title: Global Reach, Local Expertise
2.description: With a worldwide network of trusted partners, we deliver seamlessly across continents and time zones.

3.title: Real-Time Updates
3.description: Stay informed at every milestone. Our OBC team keeps you updated in real time, from pick-up to final delivery.

LogisticsAdvantage.label: Our Advantage
LogisticsAdvantage.title: Fast, Secure, and Global — Our Logistics Advantage
LogisticsAdvantage.subtitle: Your deadlines drive us.
LogisticsAdvantage.p1: OBC Care provides end-to-end logistics solutions designed for industries that can’t afford delays: <bold>aviation, automotive, and electronics.</bold>
LogisticsAdvantage.p2: We coordinate first and last mile deliveries, onboard couriers, customs clearance, and next-flight-out (NFO) arrangements to ensure every shipment arrives when it's needed most.
LogisticsAdvantage.p3: Whether it's across the city or across the world, we move faster, think smarter, and deliver with care.

ServicesCTA.title: Need a Time-Critical Delivery?
ServicesCTA.description: Whether it’s an urgent aircraft part or a last-minute production component, we deliver with speed, precision, and full visibility, <bold>around the clock.</bold>
ServicesCTA.cardDescription: Priority handling, real-time updates, and dedicated experts for your most critical moves, <bold>anywhere in the world.</bold>

Footer.followText: Stay connected with us for logistics insights and updates:
